attributes.action: Petition to award John Surtees a posthumous Knighthood
attributes.background: Sadly  "Sir" John passed away today without formal recognition of his services to motorsport as a motorcycle and Grand Prix double world champion .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
